amendment.description: Amendment adds a new section prohibiting the use of funds to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance that references or relies on the analysis contained in specified documents on the subject of the Social Cost of Carbon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section prohibiting the use of funds to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance that references or relies on, the analysis contained in specified documents, on the subject of the Social Cost of Carbon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lankford amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 191 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lankford amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 191 (Roll no. 389).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Lankford.
